DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate amount heart rate variability ( HRV ) woman gestational diabetes mellitus ( GDM ) determine whether woman GDM transient sleep-disordered breathing ( SDB ) pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant woman age 1840 year old . 2 . Pregnant woman gestational age 30 34 week . 1 . Pregnant woman know type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus . 2 . Pregnant woman carry one fetus . 3 . Pregnant woman pregestational hypertension . 4 . Pregnant woman preeclampsia current pregnancy . 5 . Pregnant woman history coronary artery disease acute ischemia . 6 . Pregnant woman currently smoke . 7 . Pregnant woman without result 3 hour 100 gram oral glucose tolerance test . 8 . Pregnant woman preterm labor , cervical shortening , premature rupture membrane obstetric complication may predispose preterm labor . 9 . Pregnant woman use 17P ( progesterone ) prevent recurrent preterm labor . 10 . Pregnant woman know SDB .
